name: J&ASoft Data File
summary: Learn about .JDAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Since the JDAT file stores data in simple text, you can use text editors such as Notepad to view the contents.
NOTE: J&ASoft Music Player has been discontinued and is not available for download.

description: Data file used by J&ASoft Music Player, a free player for Windows; contains application data such as settings, system requirements, build dates and codes, and program version.
